OrgName.entry: ST MARYS CHURCH AND COMMUNITY CENTRE - DETACHED YOUTH WORK

Desc.entry: A detached youth work project engaging with young people on the streets around the Bramall Lane area. Runs a youth group for young people aged 8 years and over and a group called Youth@Heart, a group for secondary school age young people to meet chat eat and chill out. Also runs a youth theatre. Company limited by guarantee no 4317500.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
